feed.title: VollRagm
feed.subtitle: A blog regarding reverse engineering, game hacking and the Windows operating system

entry.title: KernelSharp - Write Kernel Drivers in C#

link.title: KernelSharp - Write Kernel Drivers in C#

entry.summary:
Introduction In the past, people asked me if it was possible to write a kernel-mode Driver for Windows in C#. Now, you might be thinking that something like this would be totally foolish and serve no purpose. Let me tell you one thing: You are totally right about that. But after getting asked this question multiple times, I have decided to make it possible.
.NET in Kernel-mode? There are sever...
